thread.title: Federal Drone Registration Must Balance Safety Requirements and Fundamental American Rights

author: wn.com
title: Federal Drone Registration Must Balance Safety Requirements and Fundamental American Rights
text: ARLINGTON, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--The following statement is attributed to Gary Shapiro, president and CEO, Consumer Electronics Association (CEA)Â®, regarding the Department of Transportation's plan to require drone registration: "To ensure aviation safety, consumer privacy rights, innovation and jobs in this nascent industry, any federally mandated product registration system should be imposed narrowly to accomplish true safety goals. New federal government requirements for reporting of product ...
